author: Fextralife
description:
The Outer Worlds 2: Character Creation Guide (Backgrounds, Traits & Skills Explained)
In this Outer Worlds 2 guide, we're going to be taking a look at character creation, and I'm going to be giving you guys some tips on some things during character creation that should be useful to you. We'll discuss Backgrounds, Traits, Skills, and how to make the best possible build you can make. If you have been having a hard time creating your character, this Guide is for you. How to pick the right attributes? What are the best Skills? What Traits to pick? How to consider companions?

Timestamp:
0:00 Outer Worlds 2 Character Creation Guide & Tips
0:34 Outer Worlds 2 Background Guide
1:58 Outer Worlds 2 Traits Guide
9:40 Outer Worlds 2 Skills Guide
17:40 Starting Builds Examples
